Verses: 1 avar Marupadiyum Kadaloraththile Podhagampannath Thodanginaar. Thiralaana Janangal Avaridaththil Koodivandhapadiyaal, Avar Kadalile Nindra Oru Padavil Eri Utkaarndhaar; Janangalellaarum Kadarkaraiyil Nindraargal.
2 avar Anega Viseshangalai Uvamaigalaaga Avargalukkup Pothiththaar; Pothikkirapozhudhu Avargalukku Sonnadhu:
3 kelungal, Vidhaikkiravan Oruvan Vidhaikkap Purappattaan.
4 avan Vidhaikkaiyil, Sila Vidhai Vazhiyaruge Vizhundhadhu; Aagaayaththup Paravaigal Vandhu Adhaip Patchiththuppottadhu.
5 sila Vidhai Adhiga Mannillaadha Karpaarai Nilaththil Vizhundhadhu; Adharku Aazhamaana Mannillaadhadhinaale Seekkiraththil Mulaiththadhu.
6 veyil Erinapodho, Theeyndhupoi, Verillaamaiyaal Ularndhu Poyitru.
7 sila Vidhai Mullulla Idangalil Vizhundhadhu; Mul Valarndhu, Adhu Balan Kodaadhapadi Adhai Nerukkippottadhu.
8 sila Vidhai Nalla Nilaththil Vizhundhu, Ongivalarugira Payiraagi, Ondru Muppadhum, Ondru Arupadhum, Ondru Noorumaagap Balan Thandhadhu.
9 ketkiradharkuk Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endru Avargalukku Sonnaar.
10 avar Thaniththirukkirapodhu, Panniruvarodunkooda Avaraich Soozhndhirundhavargal Indha Uvamaiyaik Kuriththu Avaridaththil Kettaargal.
11 adharku Avar: Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththin Ragasiyaththai Ariyumpadi Ungalukku Arulappattadhu. Purambe Irukkiravargalukko Ivaigalellaam Uvamaigalaaga Sollappadugiradhu.
12 avargal Gunappadaadhapadikkum, Paavangal Avargalukku Mannikkappadaadhapadikkum, Avargal Kandum Kaanaadhavargalaagavum, Kettum Unaraadhavargalaagavum Irukkumpadi, Ippadi Sollappadugiradhu Endraar.
13 pinbu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Indha Uvamaiyai Neengal Ariyavillaiyaa? Ariyaavittaal Matra Uvamaigalaiyellaam Eppadi Ariveergal?
14 vidhaikkiravan Vasanaththai Vidhaikkiraan.
15 vasanaththaik Kettavudane, Saaththaan Vandhu, Avargal Irudhayangalil Vidhaikkappatta Vasanaththai Eduththuppodugiraan. Ivargale Vasanam Vidhaikkappadugira Vazhiyarugaanavargal.
16 appadiye, Vasanaththaik Kettavudane Adhai Santhoshaththodu Etrukkondum,

17 thangalukkulle Verkollaadhapadiyaal, Konjakkaalamaaththiram Nilaiththirukkiraargal, Vasanaththinimiththam Ubaththiravamum Thunbamum Undaanavudane Idaraladaigiraargal; Ivargale Karpaarai Nilaththil Vidhaikkappattavargal.
18 vasanaththaik Kettum, Ulagakkavalaigalum, Aisuvariyaththin Mayakkamum, Matravaigalaippatri Undaagira Ichchaigalum Utpiravesiththu, Vasanaththai Nerukkip Poda, Adhinaal Balanatruppogiraargal;
19 ivargale Mullulla Idangalil Vidhaikkappattavargal.
20 vasanaththaik Kettu, Etrukkondu, Ondru Muppadhum, Ondru Arupadhum, Ondru Noorumaagap Balankodukkiraargal; Ivargale Nalla Nilaththil Vidhaikkappattavargal Endraar.
21 pinnum Avar Avargalai Nokki: Vilakkaith Thandinmel Vaikkiradharkeyandri, Marakkaalin Keezhaakilum, Kattilin Keezhaagilum, Vaikkiradharkuk Konduvaruvaargalaa?
22 veliyarangamaagaadha Andharangamumillai, Velikku Varaadha Maraiporulumillai.
23 ketkiradharku Oruvan Kaadhullavanaayirundhaal Ketkakkadavan Endraar.
24 pinnum Avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ketkiradhaik Gavaniyungal, Endha Alavinaal Alakkireergalo, Andha Alavinaal Ungalukkum Alakkappadum; Ketkira Ungalukku Adhigam Kodukkappadum.
25 ullavanevano Avanukkuk Kodukkappadum; Illaadhavanevano Avanidaththil Ulladhum Eduththukkollappadum Endraar.
26 pinnum Avar Avargalai Nokki: Dhevanudaiya Raajyamaanadhu, Oru Manushan Nilaththil Vidhaiyai Vidhaiththu;
27 iravil Thoongi, Pagalil Vizhiththirukka, Avanukkuth Theriyaadhavidhamaai, Vidhai Mulaiththup Payiraagiradharku Oppaayirukkiradhu.
28 eppadiyendraal, Nilamaanadhu Munbu Mulaiyaiyum, Pinbu Kadhiraiyum, Kadhirile Niraindha Dhaaniyaththaiyum Balanaagath Thaanaaik Kodukkum.
29 payir Vilaindhu Aruppukkaalam Vandhavudane, Arukkiradharku Aatkalai Anuppugiraan Endraar.
30 pinnum Avar Avargalai Nokki: Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Edharku Oppiduvom? Alladhu Endha Uvamaiyinaale Adhaith Thirushtaandhappaduththuvom?
31 adhu Oru Kadugu Vidhaikku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Adhu Boomiyil Vidhaikkappadumpodhu Boomiyilulla Sagala Vidhaigalilum Siridhaayirukkiradhu;
32 vidhaikkappattapinbo, Adhu Valarndhu, Sagala Poondugalilum Peridhaagi, Aagaayaththupparavaigal Adhinudaiya Nizhalinkeezh Vandhadaiyaththakka Periya Kilaigalai Vidum Endraar.
33 avargal Kettariyum Thiraanikkuththakkadhaaga, Avar Ippadippatta Anega Uvamaigalinaale Avargalukku Vasanaththai Sonnaar.
34 uvamaigalinaaleyandri Avargalukku Ondrum Sollavillai; Avar Thammudaiya Seesharode Thaniththirukkumpodhu, Avargalukku Ellaavatraiyum Vivariththu Sonnaar.
35 andru Saayangaalaththil, Avar Avargalai Nokki: Akkaraikkup Povom Vaarungal Endraar.
36 avargal Janangalai Anuppivittu, Avar Padavilirundhapadiye Avaraik Konduponaargal. Vere Padavugalum Avarodekooda Irundhadhu.
37 appozhudhu, Balaththa Suzhalkaatru Undaagi, Padavu Nirambaththakkadhaaga, Alaigal Adhinmel Modhitru.
38 kappalin Pinnaniyaththil Avar Thalaiyanaiyai Vaiththu Niththiraiyaayirundhaar. Avargal Avarai Ezhuppi: Podhagare, Naangal Madindhupogiradhu Umakkuk Kavalaiyillaiyaa Endraargal.
39 avar Ezhundhu, Kaatrai Adhatti, Kadalaippaarththu: Iraiyaadhe, Amaidhalaayiru Endraar. Appozhudhu Kaatru Nindrupoi, Migundha Amaidhalundaayitru.
40 avar Avargalai Nokki: En Ippadip Payappatteergal? En Ungalukku Visuvaasam Illaamarpoyitru Endraar.
41 avargal Migavum Bayandhu: Ivar Yaaro? Kaatrum Kadalum Ivarukkuk Keezhppadigiradhe Endru, Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondaargal.
